text: 35-43% patients are sufferring from Nutritional Deficiency
More than 1,000,000 Australians in 2016 are iron-deficient
7.3% of the total burden of disease in Australia in 2015 was due to poor diet
Only 1 in 10 Australians met the recommendations for daily vegetable consumption
7.1% of children aged 2–17 consumed sugar sweetened drinks daily
About 41% of Australians’ energy is from discretionary foods in aged group 14 – 18
